items.title: Custom Manufacturing
items.description: Specialized custom manufacturing of precision components using advanced CNC technologies, serving critical industries with high-quality brass, stainless steel, and aluminum parts.

items.title: Surface Finishing
items.description: Advanced surface finishing techniques to enhance component durability, aesthetics, and performance across various industrial applications.

items.title: Laser Marking
items.description: Precise laser marking services for component traceability, branding, and detailed identification across different material types.

capabilities.title: Our Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: Advanced manufacturing capabilities for diverse industrial requirements

items.title: Design & Engineering
items.description: Comprehensive CAD modeling and engineering analysis to optimize component specifications and performance.

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Careful selection of premium quality materials from certified suppliers to ensure superior component integrity.

items.title: Precision Machining
items.description: Advanced CNC machining techniques to create intricate components with tight tolerances and exceptional accuracy.

items.title: Quality Assurance
items.description: Rigorous quality control processes to guarantee each component meets the highest industry standards.

manufacturingProcess.subtitle: Systematic approach ensuring quality at every step
